channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: When It Comes To Modernizing Payments, Include Everyone
item.description: Ensuring 100% digitization may be complex, but it's critical.

item.title: Brighten up a room

item.title: The AI Gold Rush: A16z's Top 100 Gen AI Consumer Apps For Savvy Investors
item.description: This high turnover rate underscores the dynamic nature of the Gen AI startups and highlights the potential for rapid growth and market disruption.

item.title: Write for someone
item.description: It’s so tempting to write for everyone. But everyone isn’t going to read your work, someone is. Can you tell me who? Precisely? What did they believe ...

item.title: Want Your Team To Return To The Office? Give Them A Good Reason To
item.description: Managers have to understand exactly how working life in an office plays out practically.

item.title: The steep part of the mountain

item.title: From Crisis To Catalyst: The Black Swan Events That Transformed Tech
item.description: Black Swan events have shaped the tech industry, revealing the critical need for resilience and strategic foresight to thrive in unpredictable times.

item.title: Sloth Fever: What To Know As Potentially Dangerous Oropouche Virus Detected In U.S.
item.description: The virus has infected more than 20 travelers returning to the U.S. from Cuba, the CDC said.
